sentences: Joyce Howard Barrell (née Gedye; 26 November 1917 – 6 December 1989) was an English composer.
She was born in Salisbury, Wiltshire, England, and was educated at Leicester University, studying with Benjamin Burrows and Harold Craxton for piano and Grace Burrows for violin.
She married composer Bernard Clements Barrell in 1945.
From 1939 until her death she composed about ninety works.
